title: Informal Tests

The purpose of this is to check whether things are more or less working. More formal test will come later.

```{r}
library(lda.svi)
lda_fit <- lda_online(reddit_tidy,K=50,passes=5)
```

```{r}
lda_fit$beta %>%
	filter(topic == 1) %>%
	arrange(desc(value)) %>%
        	
```
